title: One Of - A - Kind Virtual Seminar Company
text: Questions Business Summary This company is truly one-of-a kind! This company holds seminars nationwide for people whose interest is in locating a virtual home based business opportunity. The seminar invitations are done through low cost television commercials through a famous television star ''SEAN CONNERY'' who invites them to come to the seminar. Print advertising, radio, and many other very effective marketing methods are used. There is no competition since this is a one-of-a-kind business opportunity seminar that shows the attendees 15 different kinds of home based opportunities which they can purchase. The way this works is quite simple. In order for attendees to attend, they must first make payments for registration. This is done via a call center who takes credit card payments in advance to secure their seating. This is the first ''MONEY STREAM-FROM ATTENDEE ATTENDANCE REGISTRATIONS''. The second ''MONEY STREAM'' is from the purchases made of any of the 15 companies by attendees for these home based opportunities. The real winner however, is the seminar company! If no one purchases any companies, the money stream from registrations is still there. The company has the capability of unlimited income for seminars that can be held nationwide in hotels at the same time with various speakers in different cities, who are engaged to do the seminars. They charge nominal fees and this can go on a grand scale. The more seminars held, the larger the earnings. You as the purchasers, only need to have good organizational skills in booking hotels and in the hiring of professional speakers who conduct these seminars on your behalf. There is no such opportunity offered anywhere and THE COMPANY IS THE REAL TRUE WINNER! Financials
